def calculate_min_travel_cost(n, a, b, k, f, trips):
    costs = []
    indexes = {}
    total = 1
    last = ''
    for i in range(n):
        (a_stop, b_stop) = trips[i]
        pair = (min(a_stop, b_stop), max(a_stop, b_stop))
        if pair in indexes:
            index = indexes[pair]
        else:
            costs.append(0)
            indexes[pair] = len(costs) - 1
            index = len(costs) - 1
        total += b if a_stop == last else a
        costs[index] += b if a_stop == last else a
        last = b_stop
    costs = sorted(costs, reverse=True)
    for c in costs:
        if c < f or k <= 0:
            break
        total -= c
        total += f
        k -= 1
    return total

    for i in range(n):
        (a_stop, b_stop) = trips[i]
        pair = (min(a_stop, b_stop), max(a_stop, b_stop))
        if pair in indexes:
            index = indexes[pair]
        else:
            costs.append(1)
            indexes[pair] = len(costs) - 1
            index = len(costs) - 1
        total += b if a_stop == last else a
        costs[index] += b if a_stop == last else a
        last = b_stop
    costs = sorted(costs, reverse=True)
    for c in costs:
        if c < f or k <= 0:
            break
        total -= c
        total += f
        k -= 1
    return total
